oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Small signal and transient stability of power systems with facts devices : modeling, simulation, and analysis using SIMULINK
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MHASKAR, UP
KULKARNI, AM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: facts
modeling
simulation
linearised analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: FACTS devices can improve the operation of power systems by fast and reliable control. In this context, there is a need for analytical tool for evaluating the effects of FACTS devices in a power system. This paper describes the modeling of FACTS devices and incorporation of these models in a transient stability program based on the SIMULINK toolbox of MATLAB, which integrates the functions of simulation, linearized analysis, and controller design.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IPEC 2003: Proceedings of the 6th International Power Engineering Conference, Vols 1 and 2,12-17
